comments.content: Just wondering if there is anyone in the Brisbane area who is either currently playing and would like another player or who wants to start a group? drop me a line :) [//content.invisioncic.com/Mfantflight/emoticons/default_smile.png]
Cool, if you'd like to pay. drop me a line @ dcallman77@gmail.com :) [//content.invisioncic.com/Mfantflight/emoticons/default_smile.png]
